name: Polydrome Horizon
description:
Developed in December 2020 for 7DFPS 2020.

Unlimited ammo. No reloading. Shoot down the bugs before they can land and corrupt your sectors!

Walking over corrupted sectors inflicts damage and slows the rate of fire. Falling out of bounds inflicts severe damage.

Shoot corrupted sectors to restore them and provide temporary healing.

Also, you can double-jump? Someone once said that double-jump is instant fun. That someone was meeeeeeeeee.
